Name: Declaring National Postpartum Awareness Week for Black, Indigenous, People of Color in the City of New York, to occur annually, one week before Mother’s Day.
Title: Resolution declaring National Postpartum Awareness Week for Black, Indigenous, People of Color in the City of New York, to occur annually, one week before Mother’s Day
BodyName: Committee on Women and Gender Equity

History.Description: This Resolution was Introduced by Council
